title: Will the Trump administration destroy expired foreign aid food?
shortDescription: The Trump administration dismantled USAID, causing distribution disruptions. Now some has expired, and it is set to be destroyed due to protocol.

title: New Trump policy will keep immigration detainees locked up longer
shortDescription: A new policy rolling out nationally prevents judges from granting bond to most detained migrants.

title: Trump says he's not firing Fed chair
shortDescription: In a meeting with the Crown Prince of Bahrain, the president denied reports that he will fire the Chair of the Federal Reserve, Jerome Powell.

title: 'Not true': Trump denies plans to fire Fed Chair Jerome Powell
shortDescription: President Trump denied he plans to fire Federal Reserve chairman Jerome Powell after telling Republican lawmakers he would likely make the move.

title: US Capitol Police arrest man with guns, bow and arrow
shortDescription: U.S. Capitol Police said the man admitted to having guns in the vehicle along with the bow and arrow.

title: Trump furious at MAGA pushback on Jeffrey Epstein 'hoax'
shortDescription: Trump called supporters "weaklings" for their anger over his administration's handling of the Epstein case.

title: Gun groups challenge federal law banning mailing handguns
shortDescription: Gun Owners of America and Gun Owners Foundation are challenging a 1927 law that bans individuals from mailing guns through the postal service

title: GOP senator introduces bill to repeal Medicaid cuts in Trump tax law
shortDescription: Sen. Josh Hawley introduced a bill to repeal some of the Medicaid cuts in Trump’s sweeping tax law, after Hawley voted to pass it earlier this month.

title: Fort Who? House committee bars Hegseth's military base name changes
shortDescription: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth restored the names of Fort Benning and Fort Bragg, which were originally named for Confederate generals.

title: President Trump says he doesn't understand interest in Epstein case
shortDescription: President Trump expressed bewilderment at interest in the Jeffrey Epstein case as MAGA voices press for the full release of more files.

title: Senate Republicans weigh billions of dollars in spending cuts
shortDescription: Plus: New lengths immigrants are going to for legal fee fundraising. | Reparations for atom bomb victims 80 years after the Trinity Test.

title: Ukraine celebrates Trump's weapons reversal, but 'devil's in the details'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has finally found a way to like arming Ukraine: ask European allies to donate their weapons, and sell them American replacements.

title: Trump’s hero garden gets $40 million with megabill. Who will be in it?
shortDescription: Donald Trump is bringing back an idea from his first presidency: a statue garden of America's heroes. The project just got $40 million in funding.

title: Late congressman's daughter wins Democratic nomination to succeed him
shortDescription: Arizona's Rep. Raul Grijalva died in March at 77. His daughter, Adelita, is one step closer to taking up his mantle in Washington.
